column5: Hey Guys my name is Jeff and I have 3 rooms available room, it is a great space with access to all 3 bathrooms. We have movie room, dining room, full kitchen where you can use any of the appliances and dishes. 10mins to University of Texas and less than 15 mins away from Downtown! More than enough space to bring the crew! You will get some of the best sleep ever on the Sleep Number King size bed! Netflix and Amazon Prime Video are also available in the house
column8: The Beautiful house on Glebe ready for SXSW!
